description: If you read The Washington Post, you should try this app.  It compiles the latest news from several sections of the Post and it brings it all to you in an organized, simple and elegant way.  You can scan through the latest headlines or view each article in full screen. It will even search YouTube for videos relevant to the article you are reading. You will get a constant flow of fresh news of the U.S. and around world.  Version 1.0.8 now includes the Sports section.
